title: Is Death Stranding Too Smart for America? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.11.19
description:
To get 10% off AND free shipping, go to http://brooklinen.com and use promo code games.

Get 20% off and free shipping with the code GAMES at http://manscaped.com.

Go to http://escapetheinvasion.com/kfgames for 20% off your first box!

Snowbike Mike joins Greg to talk about Death Stranding reviews, Blizzard, and more!

Time Stamps -
00:07:02 - Housekeeping
Love, Sex, & Stuff: After DarkPremieres this Friday Live 8PM-10PM PT!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Mathew, Carolina, Black Jack, Zack Parsley, Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:09:15 - Kojima on US Criticism of Death Stranding, Alessio Palumbo @ WCCFTECH
00:18:18 - Concerns about Famitsu in Death Stranding, Brian AShcraft @ Kotaku
00:21:15 With a prominent figure from the company appearing in the game should their score still count towards the average? - Frankfurtter - Best Friend Qs
00:28:30 - Kojima Won a Guinness World Record for Social Media, Joseph Knoop @ IGN
00:31:15 - Stadia Launch Line-up
00:47:51 - Since we have an Xbox fan in the building, what are you most excited for about this year's XO19? - The Nano Biologist
00:41:15 - Overwatch’s Jeff Kaplan on Blitzchung, Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:45:18 -Twitch Streamer 'Trained For 3 Months' To Try And Break 566-Hour Streaming Record Cecilia @ Kotaku
00:52:08 -  BROOKLINEN
00:53:40 - MANSCAPED
00:55:13 - ESCAPE THE INVASION
00:56:12 - Out today
Reader mail   -
00:59:06 - Do you think PSX is officially dead, or is the chance of it's return even higher now? - Alex Wolfe
01:02:52 - “should I get an Xbox now, or wait for the Scarlett?” - MaDogNik96 (from Massachusetts)
01:06:20 - Squad Up: Follow @SnowBikeMike!
https://twitter.com/snowbikemike
https://www.instagram.com/snowbikemike
https://twitch.tv/snowbikemike/
01:07:20 - You‘re Wrong
This week’s Hosts:
TUESDAY: Greg and Imran
WEDNESDAY: Greg and Whitta
THURSDAY: Greg and Ash Paulsen
FRIDAY: Greg and Tim
